mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESVE_BLCLST (RESVE_NO, RESVE_EMPNO, START_DT, END_DT, REG_DT) SELECT RESVE_NO, RESVE_EMPNO, STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), '00000'), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), DATE_ADD( DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), '00000'), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), INTERVAL #{weeks} WEEK), INTERVAL -1 SECOND ), NOW() FROM RESVE_STTUS WHERE RESVE_DE = DATE_FORMAT(SUBDATE(CURRENT_DATE, 1),'%Y%m%d') AND CANCL_YN != 'Y' AND COMPT_YN != 'Y' AND SUCCS_YN != 'Y' AND RESVE_EMPNO != '' AND RESVE_EMPNO IS NOT NULL
mapper.select: SELECT A.RESVE_NO, A.START_DT AS PANELTY_START_DT, DATE_FORMAT(A.START_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS PANELTY_START_DT_STR, A.END_DT AS PANELTY_END_DT, DATE_FORMAT(A.END_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS PANELTY_END_DT_STR, B.RESVE_DE, B.RESVE_TM, B.BLD_CODE, B.BED_CODE, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM CMMN_CODE WHERE CODE_TYL='RVT' AND CODE = B.RESVE_TM) AS RESVE_TM_STR, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM CMMN_CODE WHERE CODE_TYL='BLD' AND CODE = B.BLD_CODE) AS BLD_NM, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM CMMN_CODE WHERE CODE_TYL='BED' AND CODE_TYS= B.BLD_CODE AND CODE = B.BED_CODE) AS BED_NM, (SELECT HNAME FROM INF_PERSON_INFO_RCV WHERE EMPNO=#{empno}) AS EMPNM FROM RESVE_BLCLST A INNER JOIN RESVE_STTUS B ON A.RESVE_NO = B.RESVE_NO WHERE NO = ( SELECT MAX(NO) FROM RESVE_BLCLST WHERE STR_TO_DATE(#{resveDe}, '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN START_DT AND END_DT AND RESVE_EMPNO = #{empno} )
